name: CL_PROV_PIN
description: This table contains provider insurance filing information for contacts in the Provider PIN (PIN) master file.

columns.name: PIN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Provider Personal Identification Number (PIN) record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date in internal format.

columns.name: PROV_REF_NAME
columns.description: The provider or referral source name.
